text: If tuple and a tuple satisfy the join condition, then they have the same value for the join attributes. If that value is hashed to some partition i, the tuple must be in r; and the S tuple in s;. Therefore, R tuples in r; need only to be compared with S tuples in s;. &ZCMU-DB ' “ Ç 0 E e l —" F — |4 b - PI o) 40:10/1:11:34 - WHEN IS SORT-MERGE JOIN USEFUL? > ﬁ! * “ El | E]
